Title: Establishes the crime of endangering the welfare of a child in the first degree
Summary: Establishes the crime of endangering the welfare of a child in the first degree; makes technical corrections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of endangering the welfare of a child in the first degree; and to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to making technical corrections thereto
